Title: SmartMap
Description: SmartMap (C# cross-platform) is a procedural style map creation utility mainly for the Axiom 3D rendering engine. Included is a GDI+ 2D world editor with graphical features and soon your choice of renderer and scene manager to create your preferred world perspective.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SmartMap (C# cross-platform) is a procedural style map creation utility mainly for the Axiom 3D rendering engine. Included is a GDI+ 2D world editor with graphical features and soon your choice of renderer and scene manager to create your preferred world perspective.
  • WALL RECOGNITION
  • NAVIGATION
  • AUTO-MOLD TERRAIN
  • CITY AND STRUCTURE CREATION
  • TERRAIN DEFORMATION
SMARTMAP DESIGN AND UML


Created and managed by - Mark V Madsen
